data.title: GAMMA: Relativistic hydro and local cooling on a moving mesh
data.name: GAMMA
data.description: Relativistic hydro and local cooling on a moving mesh

evidence: "GAMMA is a code for modeling relativistic hydrodynamics and non-thermal emission on a moving mesh."

"Clone this repository in a directory of your choice. Move to the directory and build the code." followed by `mpirun -n N_nodes ./bin/GAMMA` usage, indicating an end-user simulation application run from source.

"Python plotting functions are available in `/bin/Tools/plotting_scripts.py`. These functions should be run from this directory.", together with the publication reference, shows it directly produces research simulation outputs.
